Description:

Braveland - great turn-based strategy with classic gameplay (battles take place on the similarity of the game series Heroes of Might and Magic) from domestic developers. The authors were inspired Kingdom Rush (visual appearance) and the already mentioned series of Heroes of Might and Magic, what eventually happened to you to decide! 
Braveland a turn-based strategy game in the spirit of the old school. You will begin your path simple warrior, native village where bandits looted, and complete his talented commander of your army. During the game, your army will join the new army - archers, healer, crossbowmen, knights. History of the game takes place in kropoltivo painted colorful world and through which path will be the hero.
